Download¶

Install EPTA from command line¶

You can install EPTA easily from PIPL or Annaconda

  • PIPL:

    -pip instal easy_protein_tree_annotating

  • Conda

    -conda install easy_protein_tree_annotating

Download EPTA manually:¶

You can also download EPTA manually:

  1. Go to our Github page : https://github.com/Phillip404/easy_protein_tree_annotating

  2. Press the green button ‘Code’

  3. Click the subtag ‘Download Zip’

  4. Unzip the zip file

  5. Download pandas package

  6. Download biopython package

  7. Open your console, whatever it is

  8. Go to the folder you unzipped EPTA

  9. Run EPTA and check command line flags:

    -python3 main.py -h

.. Caution::

  'python3' could be different identifier according to your envorinment.

  For example: python, py, py3

  10. Enjoy your tree building!
